Server and Data Center

Most of my dedicated servers have superfast SSD disks, which have been thoroughly tested and proven to work very efficiently under any kind of stress. Also, an SSD-equipped dedicated server will work far better CPU-wise, due to the fact that the faster data access speed will decrease the CPU wait time. I have chosen one of the most dependable and protected USA datacenter to house your dedicated hosting server. The Steadfast facility is positioned close to a communications centre, at the centre of Chicago, Illinois, and it provides a good amount of system capacity and light–speed connections to the East and West Shorelines. Security is warranted by an onsite monitoring team on shift 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. The possibility of blackouts triggered by natural disasters is significantly minimized as well.

Risk-free Hosting

To top it all, my web hosting service is completely risk–free. I offer you a 99.9% server uptime guarantee, which goes to say that your websites will be up and running regardless of what happens with my hosting servers. And in case you’ve got any concerns, my customer care staff is at your disposal 24x7x365 and the guaranteed client support ticket response time is under 60 minutes. In case you’re displeased with my cloud web hosting service for any reason, you’ll get a reimbursement. I offer a 30–day money–back guarantee.

Services

What Can I Do For You?

I can serve for the business of web design, web develop, UI/UX design, search engine optimization (SEO) including web hosting, domain registration, database mangement, tele marketing, e-mail marketing, social marketing, print design-marketing and event management

Web Design

Everything about your website - including the way it looks and the way it works - is determined by the website design. My web design is a process of conceptualizing, planning, and building a collection of electronic files that deliver pages to your site visitors. I help to make your business appear credible online.

Web Development

Web development is the process of developing websites containing server-side coding, client-side coding and database technology. I will develop your favorite website; whether it’s an e-commerce store, blog, social network, online video streaming service, or any other type of Internet application.

UI/UX Design

UX design refers to user experience design, while UI design stands for user interface design. Both of these are crucial to an IT product and need to work closely together. I can take care every step whether it is necessary. UX design is a just waking up fact that need more attention.

SEO

My optimization can take many forms. It's everything from making sure the title tags and meta descriptions are both informative and the right length to pointing internal links at pages you're proud of. I always prefer to build an SEO-friendly site and follow the best practices for improving the search engine rankings

Hosting Service

I offer cloud web hosting bundles with an emphasis on scalability, security and speed. With a 30 day free trial Basic hosting starts at $2.75/mo includes unlimited Disk Space and Traffic, Money Back Guarantee, 100 Email Accounts, shared ssl ip, ModSecurity firewall and lot of free features. I also offer free hosting with free sub-domain

Consultancy

I can provide consultancy service for your existing or new business of web re-design, web re-develop, UI/UX re-design, accurate search engine optimization (SEO) including web hosting plan and guidline for tele and e-mail marketing, social marketing. I serve clients across the country and all over the world
